title: and the Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I.
heading: 3. Part II of the First Schedule (as amended by Article 4 of the Food Safety
text_raw:
3. Part II of the First Schedule (as amended by Article 4 of the Food Safety 
Authority of Ireland Act 1998 (Amendment of First Schedule) Order 2024 (S.I. 
No. 284 of 2024)) to the Act is amended- 

(a) 

by deleting the following statutory instruments: 

“European Communities (Control of salmonella in breeding 
flocks of domestic fowl) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 706 of 
2006).”, 

“European Communities (Control of Salmonella in Laying Flocks 
of Domestic Fowl) Regulations 2008 (S.I. No. 247 of 2008).”, 

“European Communities (Control of Salmonella in Broilers) 
Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 64 of 2009).”, 

“European Communities (Control of Salmonella in Turkeys) 
Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 99 of 2010).”, and 

“European Communities 
Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 155 of 2012).”, and 

(Sustainable Use of Pesticides) 

(b) by inserting the following statutory instruments: 

“European Union (Plant Health) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 459 
of 2020). 

Import and Export of Animals and Animal Products (Animal 
Health Certificates) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 784 of 2021). 

Control of Salmonella Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 305 of 2024). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [249] 3 

European Union (Marketing Standards for Poultry and Hatching 
Eggs) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 307 of 2024). 

Designation Under Regulation 17 of the European Union 
(Official Controls in relation to Food Legislation Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020) (S.I. No. 395 of 2024). 

Veterinary Medicinal Products Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 462 of 
2024).”.

text_raw:
5. The Second Schedule (as amended by Article 5 of the Food Safety 
Authority of Ireland Act 1998 (Amendment of First and Second Schedules) 
Order 2017 (S.I. No. 107 of 2017)) to the Act is amended by removing “a local 
authority,”. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 11 June 2025 

JENNIFER MURNANE O’CONNOR, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Health

title: and the Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025 (S.I.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends the First and Second Schedules to the Food Safety Authority 
of Ireland Act 1998. 

This Order may be cited as the Food Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998 
(Amendment of First and Second Schedules) Order 2025. 

For ease of reference, a list of all food legislation and official agencies, as 
contained in the First and Second Schedules to the Food Safety Authority of 
Ireland Act 1998, as well as a list of Regulations made under the European 
Communities Act 1972 and deemed to be food legislation for the purposes of the 
Food Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998, and Regulations made under the 
Health Act 1947 as amended by section 25 of the Irish Medicines Board 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2006, can be found on the website www.fsai.ie 
(https://www.fsai.ie/enforcement-and-legislation/enforcement/fsai-act-andrelated-legislation) 

 
 
 
 
 36 [249] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó
